latestAction.text: Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 157.

item.title: Emergency Supplemental Appropriations Act for Defense, the Global War on Terror, and Tsunami Relief, 2005

item.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote. (text: CR H2985)
Passed/agreed to in House: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.(text: CR H2985)
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 224 - 196 (Roll no. 159). (consideration: CR H2995)
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 258.
Considered as privileged matter. (consideration: CR H2985-2995)
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 35.
Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H.R. 1268 with 1 hour of general debate.
The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 109-73, by Mr. Cole (OK).
The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 109-73, by Mr. Cole (OK).

summary.text:
Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H.R. 1268 (making emergency supplemental appropriations for FY 2005).

Authorizes the Chairman of the Committee on the Judiciary, on behalf of the Committee, to file a supplemental report to accompany H.R. 748 (Child Interstate Abortion Notification Act).

(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)

Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H.R. 1268 (making emergency supplemental appropriations for FY 2005).

Authorizes the Chairman of the Committee on the Judiciary, on behalf of the Committee, to file a supplemental report to accompany H.R. 748 (Child Interstate Abortion Notification Act).

(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)

Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H.R. 1268 (making emergency supplemental appropriations for FY 2005).

Authorizes the Chairman of the Committee on the Judiciary, on behalf of the Committee, to file a supplemental report to accompany H.R. 748 (Child Interstate Abortion Notification Act).

bill.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 1268) making Emergency Supplemental Appropriations for Defense, the Global War on Terror, and Tsunami Relief, for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2005, and for other purposes.

dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
dublinCore.dc:contributor: Congressional Research Service, Library of Congress
dublinCore.dc:description: This file contains bill summaries and statuses for federal legislation. A bill summary describes the most significant provisions of a piece of legislation and details the effects the legislative text may have on current law and federal programs. Bill summaries are authored by the Congressional Research Service (CRS) of the Library of Congress. As stated in Public Law 91-510 (2 USC 166 (d)(6)), one of the duties of CRS is "to prepare summaries and digests of bills and resolutions of a public general nature introduced in the Senate or House of Representatives". For more information, refer to the User Guide that accompanies this file.
